title: Hearts of Iron 4 Trial of Allegiance DLC review – gone South
description:
South America is often an under-used region in Paradox titles, but new Hearts of Iron 4 DLC Trial of Allegiance aims to remedy this, sewing the continent into its already giant WW2 blanket. Historically, the fighting in the region was extremely limited - but this expansion brings in full focus trees for some key nations on the continent, with both historical and ahistorical options for us to dig into. How does it stack up against previous HOI4 expansions? Read on to find out.

title: World first Warhammer 40k conference calls for academic papers
description:
A group of academics from Heidelberg University, Germany, and Lancaster, UK, are calling for papers for the first ever academic conference about Warhammer 40,000. According to the group, so far Warhammer 40k has “escaped scholarly attention”, but “Warhammer Conference aims to change this”. The conference will take place in person and online on September 27 – … Continued

title: The best DnD feats 5e explained
description:
DnD feats are designed to give Dungeons and Dragons players some serious character customization options. Even after you've created your personality and established your place in the party, there's still scope for creative experimentation. The very best D&D feats 5e offers the extra power, complexity, or fun factor that your character needs.

title: If you had this mobile game, you get 1500 free MTG Arena gems
description:
On Wednesday, Wizards of the Coast quietly announced that its Magic the Gathering-themed digital card game Magic Spellsingers was shutting down. To ease the blow for disappointed fans, and in an unexpected windfall for anyone who logged into Spellslingers once and then completely forgot that it existed, the firm is offering 1,500 free MTG Arena … Continued

title: Best chess sets to buy in 2024
description:
Everyone’s idea of what the best chess sets look like is a little different. Some are after practicality, affordability, or tournament legality. Others want a memorable showpiece to display at home. Whatever your perfect chess set looks like, we’ve got some recommendations to suit – all of which are (reasonably) affordable, easy to use, and high-quality.

title: The best Lego Creator Expert sets to buy in 2024
description:
Beautiful buildings, iconic vehicles, and intricate details – these are the traits of the best Lego Creator Expert sets. They offer a more grown-up way to experience Lego, adding an extra dose of beauty and complexity to the building experience. If you’re shopping for a great Lego Creator set, we can point you in the right direction.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh World Championship returns to US after 8 years
description:
